meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jody Johnston Emmett Maguire Jerry Frankel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #80.

td.p: Jody Johnston, a theater director from Las Vegas, Nevada
Emmett Maguire, a contract negotiator originally from the Bronx
Jerry Frankel, a musician originally from Buffalo, New York (whose 4-day cash winnings total $17,650)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Charlton Heston\'s charioteer')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_3', 'clue_DJ_2_3_stuck', '(Jerry: What is milk?)
(Jody: What is water?)
...
(Alex: What is [*]? Remember? He was working in France. He wanted to help the [*] people.)

wine

JerryJody
Triple Stumper
')

"The Marines\' Hymn"

Jerry
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_DJ_4_4', 'clue_DJ_4_4_stuck', 'Title of this official song of the U.S. Marine Corps:

"From the Halls of Montezuma /
To the shores of Tripoli /
We fight our country\'s battles /
In the air, on land, and sea..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Title of this official song of the U.S. Marine Corps:
"From the Halls of Montezuma /
To the shores of Tripoli /
We fight our country's battles /
In the air, on land, and sea..."

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_4', 'clue_DJ_6_4_stuck', 'Arthur\'s partner who advised each week, "Put a little fun in your life - try dancing"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Arthur's partner who advised each week, "Put a little fun in your life - try dancing"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', '(Jerry: [selecting this clue] I\'m going to finish COLONIAL AMERICA.)
(Alex: Yes, come hell or high water.)

freedom of the press

Emmett
')

div.onmouseover:

bluebirds

Jody
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_4_5', 'clue_DJ_4_5_stuck', 'What British hoped to see flying "over the white cliffs of Dover" at end off WWII')

Blanche DuBois

EmmettJody
')

tr.td: Her best line was "I have always depended on the kindness of strangers"

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alaska, Hawaii, California, Oregon & Washington.]
EmmettWhat is five?
$2,400
JodyWhat is 5?
$4,600
JerryWhat is five?
$5,400
5')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Number of states that touch the Pacific Ocean')

tr.td: Number of states that touch the Pacific Ocean
3rd place: Jules Jurgensen lady's gent's watches
2nd place: Dresher brass bed & Bassett Dream Maker mattress
